Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago White Sox and the Detroit Tigers meet Saturday in MLB action from Comerica Park.
This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
Sean Burke will start for the White Sox on Saturday. So far Burke is 1-0 with a 1.93 ERA in three games (two starts) during his rookie campaign.
Beau Brieske will start for Detroit on Saturday. Brieske is 4-4 with a 3.56 ERA and 68 Ks this year.
Eight of the White Sox's last nine games have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Six of the last seven games between the White Sox and Tigers at Comerica Park have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Tigers' last nine day games against American League opponents.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the White Sox's last six road games.
Matt Vierling has recorded a Double in each of his last three appearances against the White Sox after playing the previous day.
Kerry Carpenter has recorded at least one Single in each of his last six appearances against AL Central opponents that held a losing record.
Matt Vierling has scored at least one run in five of his last six appearances against AL Central opponents that held a losing record.
Javier Baez has hit a home run in two of his last three home appearances with the Tigers against AL opponents.
Riley Greene has recorded two or more total bases in each of his last seven home appearances against the White Sox after playing the previous day.
Colt Keith has recorded at least one RBI in five of the Tigers' last six games against AL Central opponents that held a losing record.
Riley Greene has recorded at least one hit in each of his last eight appearances against AL Central opponents that held a losing record.
Andrew Benintendi has recorded an RBI in three of his last four appearances against AL opponents.
Andrew Vaughn has recorded at least one hit in each of his 10 previous Saturday appearances against AL Central teams that held a winning record.
Yoan Moncada has recorded a Double in six of his last eight appearances in day games against AL Central teams that held a winning record.
Yoan Moncada has recorded a Single in each of his last five appearances against opponents that held a winning record.
Luis Robert has scored a run in four of his last five appearances in day games.
Andrew Vaughn has hit a home run in four of the White Sox's last eight road games against AL opponents.
Yoan Moncada has recorded two or more total bases in seven of his last eight appearances in day games against AL Central teams that held a winning record.
